data.question: What is the publication year of the article discussing an open-framework material with dangling organic functional groups?
Who is the corresponding author for the paper on open-framework materials?
What is the primary use of open-framework and microporous materials as mentioned in the text?
What synthetic principle is highlighted for the creation of open-framework structures?
data.answer: Charge-matching of inorganic or organic cationic species with suitable ionic framework precursor species

data.question: What is the pH of the mixture used for synthesizing the title compound?
What is the temperature and duration for heating the mixture in the synthesis of the title compound?
What is the role of ethylenediamine molecules in the structure of the title compound?
data.answer: Structure-directing agents located within the wall that separates the 24-ring channels

data.question: How does the presence of BTC molecules in the title compound get suggested?
data.answer: By the thermogravimetric analysis showing a significant weight loss between 200 and 780 °C

data.question: What does the synthesis of the title compound exemplify in terms of synthetic principle?
data.answer: The use of the charge-compensating principle in generating novel open-framework structures

data.question: What is the effect of using different carboxylic acids in the synthesis of the title compound?
data.answer: All of the carboxylic acids led to the formation of the 24-ring framework

data.question: What unique feature does the title compound possess in terms of its structure?
data.answer: Dangling carboxylic functional groups uniformly distributed in the channel

data.question: What is the significance of the structure-directing reagent in the title compound?
data.answer: It is located along the 24-ring framework metal sites, making organic functional groups accessible for further chemical manipulation

data.question: Is the title compound a rare example of an open-framework material with dangling carboxylic functional groups?
Does the synthesis of the title compound involve the use of a Teflon-coated steel autoclave?
Are the ethylenediamine molecules located at the center of the 24-ring channels?
Is the Zn/P ratio in the title compound maintained at 1?
Does the title compound contain only 24-ring channels?
Is the publication DOI for the article 10.1021/ja002118l?
Was the title compound synthesized without the addition of BTC?
Are the dangling carboxylic groups in the title compound well defined in terms of their atomic positions?
